title: Cloudflare API Shield - Security
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of traffic and security events across Cloudflare-protected endpoints. It covers request patterns, client details, and security actions such as allow or blocks and leaked credential detections.

definition.content:
[CloudFlare API Shield](https://www.cloudflare.com/en-in/application-services/products/api-shield/) is a comprehensive solution designed to protect, manage, and monitor Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) against various security threats and operational challenges.

This dashboard provides a high-level overview of traffic and security events across Cloudflare-protected endpoints. It covers request patterns, client details, and security actions such as allow or blocks and leaked credential detections.

For more information, see the [CloudFlare API Shield Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cloudflare_api_shield/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Allowed vs Blocked Requests Over Time
Blocked API Requests by Schema Validation
Blocked API Requests by Sequence Mitigation
Blocked Requests By API Shield Over Time

search.query: source:cloudflare-api-shield service:http-request-logs @securitySource:(apiShieldSchemaValidation OR apiShieldTokenValidation OR apiShieldSequenceMitigation) @securityAction:block $security_action $client_ip $cache_status $security_source $request_host $request_endpoint

definition.title: Top Client IPs with Failed Requests
Distribution by Client HTTP Protocol Versions

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates **Cloudflare API Shield** events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
